sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-header @changePage="changePage"></v-header>
  <v-catalog v-if="page==1"></v-catalog>
  <VCart
      v-if="page==2"
      :cart_data="CART"
  />
</template>

<script>
import VMainWrapper from "@/components/v-main-wrapper";
import VHeader from "@/components/v-header";
import VCart from "@/components/v-cart";
import {mapGetters} from "vuex";
import VCatalog from "@/components/v-catalog";

export default {
  name: "v-main-page",
  components: {VCatalog, VCart, VHeader, VMainWrapper},
  data(){
    return{
      page: 1
    }
  },
  methods:{
    changePage(page){
      this.page = page;
    }
  },
  computed:{
    ...mapGetters('CART')
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
v-main-wrapper{
  max-width: 900px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
</style>
